showScoreExcerpt:
“Under the assured guidance of director Kenny Leon, the entire cast steps lightly, and boldly, at the same time: a magical feat. The show is beautifully paced, exquisitely designed (Derek McLane), costumed (Emilio Sosa) and lit (Adam Honoré); what’s more, it pays honor to legendary actor/writer/activist Ossie Davis with love and respect.”
